channel.title: Creative Productivity on Stefan Lesser
channel.description: Recent content in Creative Productivity on Stefan Lesser

item.title: Writing as Thinking
item.description: It crossed my mind to revive this blog with a meta post about writing. But there are too many blogs out there that haven't published anything in a long time, and the last post describes in great detail how the author plans to focus more on writing and finally publish more content on a regular schedule. Not where I want to end upâ€¦ Tricking myself into writing Late last year I sent an email to a few friends letting them in on my mischievous plan to manipulate myself to write more and share the results publicly.
